WorkItem.Description: Hi Guys, Are you guys planning on porting this template over to MVC 3.0 by any chance?

Comments.Message:
I see you have an initial port to MVC 3. Thought I'd report an error with the login screen.

The current IHttpHandler is not one of types: System.Web.UI.Page, DotNetOpenAuth.IEmbeddedResourceRetrieval.  An embedded resource URL provider must be set in your .config file.
Line 11 : @MvcHtmlString.Create(Html.OpenIdSelector(new SelectorButton[] {

I would love to see this fixed as I'm having difficulty finding a working example of MVC 3 razor and DotNetOpenAuth.
denizm10, I submitted a change last night that should fix the issue you're having. See http://nerddinner.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/63323
The Port to MVC 3 is about complete. As a result, I'm closing this work item.
